content: this design comes to you all as a gift for your support and kindness throughout the years of my knitting / pattern writing the inspiration for the hat and name came from a field of plants which are planted evenly in row… pole in polish means field pole hat is a medium weight hat designed for chilly autumn or a bit warmer winter pole hat has a simple seamless construction which is broken by 4 sets of decreases it is knitted bottom up it can be worn folded with a snug fit or slouchy sizes small medium measurements circumference around brim 42 46 cm / 16 18 fit head circumference 48 52 54 60 cm / 20½ 21½ 21¼ - 23½ heigth 24 cm 26 cm / 9½ 10¼ note measurements taken after blocking materials golden eagle alpaca col 15 100% alpaca 50 g / 165 m 1 76 oz / 180 yds held together with 7 oczek silk mohair lace in kirsch 30% silk 70% kid mohair 100g / 420 m 3 5 oz/ 400 yds 1 skein of each color or approx main yarn alpaca - 165m yds 180 yds additional yarn kid mohair - 200 m 218 yds suggested needles 3 25 mm / us 3 working needle or size needed for gauge 40 cm / 16 circular and/or dpns or long circular for magic loop 3 mm / us 2½ mm for ribbing 40 cm / 16 circular or double-pointed needles or long circular for magic loop notions bor marker tapestry needle for weaving gauge 24 sts x 39 row = 10 cm / 4 on 3 25mm / us 3 in faux rib pattern measured after blocking take time to save time and check your gauge adjust needle size if necessary to obtain the correct gauge special techniques and tips tubular italian cast-on centered double decrease both provided by a photo tutorial
